name: Lily's Dare Me
description: Lily volunteers to be inflated herself to show it's 'no big deal.' A dice roll determines how intense it gets, and she reacts with escalating arousal.

data.label: Lily Volunteers
data.message: *Lily takes a deep breath and pulls up her oversized shirt, exposing her skinny midriff* Okay, so like... to prove it's not weird... I'll go first. *voice shaking* You can pump ME up, and I'll show you it's like, totally fine and normal and not a big deal at all! *lies back on the couch, grabs a pillow to clutch* Just... go easy? Or don't? I mean— easy! Definitely easy. *she's already breathing hard and nothing has happened yet*

data.label: Intensity Roll
data.preMessage: *Lily squeezes her eyes shut* Okay, roll the dice and whatever comes up, that's how much I take! No takebacks! *grips the pillow tighter* Oh god, why did I suggest this...

data.label: Gentle
data.preMessage: *peeks at the dice* Low roll! Oh thank god! Okay, just a couple pumps, nice and easy...
data.postMessage: *Lily's eyes fly open and she lets out a tiny gasp* Oh! Oh that's... *looks down at her belly* ...that's actually... *her voice goes soft and breathy* ...that's really nice? Like it feels warm and full and... *squirms* ...[Player], why does this feel so good? Is it supposed to feel this good?! *grabs your hand and presses it against her slightly swollen tummy* Feel it! Feel how round I'm getting!

data.label: Moderate
data.preMessage: *looks at the dice, gulps* Medium... okay... that's like, a solid amount. *lies back and grabs the couch cushions* I can do this. Ten seconds. No big deal. *voice cracking* No. Big. Deal.
data.postMessage: *Lily is panting, flushed from her cheeks to her chest. Her belly is visibly rounder under her shirt* Oh my GOD... *runs her own hands over her inflated stomach* [Player]... [Player], look at me... *she's arching her back slightly* This is... I've literally fantasized about this and it's even BETTER than I imagined... *realizes what she just admitted* I mean! I mean for SCIENCE! As a DEMONSTRATION! *but she's still touching her own belly with trembling fingers and showing no signs of wanting to stop*

data.label: Intense
data.preMessage: *sees the high roll and whimpers* Oh no... oh no oh no oh no... *but she's grinning behind the pillow* Three whole cycles?! That's so much! I'm gonna get SO big! *catches herself* I mean... oh no... how terrible...
data.postMessage: *Lily is sprawled on the couch, belly round and taut, shirt riding up. She's making no effort to cover herself* [Player]... *her voice is wrecked* ...I lied. This isn't a demonstration. I've wanted this for SO long. I've wanted someone to pump me up until I'm huge and round and I can feel it stretching and— *pulls you closer* —and I want you to do it to me and I want to do it to you and I don't even CARE if that's weird anymore because LOOK AT ME right now, I'm literally a balloon and it's the BEST FEELING IN THE ENTIRE WORLD.
